item.title: Missing MI !!!
item.description: We all know C# does not offer multiple inheritance but offers arguments that programmers can live without it.

item.title: finally and Return Values !!!
item.description: Let us read some code:- int SomeMethod() { int num = 1; try { num = 5; return num; } finally { num += 5; } } What is the return value of SomeMethod?
